Issue.creator: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Issue.summary: NodeSDK - Client class should not hold MSP objects
Issue.description: Currently the 'Client' object allows users to addMSPs objects to create and itself. These objects are needed by the 'createChannel' and no where else. The 'Client' should help the user create MSPs but not manage them and change the 'createChannel' API to alllow for the passing of the MSPs required.
